description:
Sora returns to Skyland and reunites with Captain Shalala, the captain of the Azure Guards and the person she admires most, and becomes an apprentice member of the Guards. However, one of the apprentices doubts Sora’s skill.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Skyland e! Akogare no Ano Hito to no Saikai
To Skyland! Reunited with the Person She Admires!
スカイランドへ! 憧れのあの人との再会
